name: FPS Microtest
description:
FPS Microtest Shooter with 8 Types of Weapons,  4 Types of Enemies  and 2 Bosses Description:

I've been playing around with the "FPS Microgame" Unity asset, and here's what I've done with it. 

You can play with 8 weapons there (some of them hidden), can you catch find them all? 

IF YOU FINISHED GAME YOU CAN TRY TO:
  • Fnd all 8 weapons
  • Win without jetpack
  • Find your own challenge and overcome it
• NOTE: If the game drops fps, check the "TAB" Pause/Options menu, turn off "Lights" and turn "Falling Fire Quantity" slider on minimum. Also you can try "Look Distance" slider, but on low values it may look weird. SCREENSHOTS:
